scripts.package:cjs: ${npm_execpath} run rollup:cjs && echo "#!/usr/bin/env node" > ./${npm_package_config_out_dir}/${npm_package_name}.bin.js && cat ./${npm_package_config_out_dir}/${npm_package_name}.cjs.js >> ./${npm_package_config_out_dir}/${npm_package_name}.bin.js && chmod u+x ./${npm_package_config_out_dir}/${npm_package_name}.bin.js
